test_vote_validation
====================

.. py:module:: test_vote_validation

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Tests for vote validation - ensuring votes only accepted for existing activities.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_vote_validation.client


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_vote_validation.reset_votes
   test_vote_validation.setup_admin_activities
   test_vote_validation.test_vote_for_existing_admin_activity
   test_vote_validation.test_vote_for_nonexistent_activity
   test_vote_validation.test_vote_mixed_existing_and_nonexistent
   test_vote_validation.test_vote_multiple_existing_activities


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: reset_votes()

   Clear votes before each test.


.. py:function:: setup_admin_activities()

   Ensure we have at least one admin activity for testing.


.. py:function:: test_vote_for_existing_admin_activity()

   Test that voting for an existing admin activity succeeds.


.. py:function:: test_vote_for_nonexistent_activity()

   Test that voting for a non-existent activity returns 404.


.. py:function:: test_vote_mixed_existing_and_nonexistent()

   Test that voting with a mix of existing and non-existing activities fails.


.. py:function:: test_vote_multiple_existing_activities()

   Test voting for multiple existing admin activities.


.. py:data:: client
